entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Snow at times heavy beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
